summary: In this mod you will find me, Krimsin, as a follower (in Dragonsreach), who summons a few of my characters I have written about; my character is not voice acted yet, but is a free follower, and marriageable if you are into that sort of thing.
descriptionHtml: In this mod you will find me, Krimsin, as a follower (in Dragonsreach), who summons a few of my characters I have written about; my character is not voice acted yet, but is a free follower, and marriageable if you are into that sort of thing.
author: Krimsin1992
